message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm willing to give you a 50% discount if you're willing to buy it now, but if you decline, the price will be $100. What do you say?
I'll take it at the discounted price of $50.

I've got a new product for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, but I want to give you a heads up that I've had some issues with this particular product. I've had some complaints about its performance, and I'm not sure if it's up to my usual standards. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll let you have it for the full price of $100. If you decline, I'll just have to move on to the next one.
I'm willing to take the risk for $100.

I've got a new product for you, and I'm confident that this one is a winner. I've had great feedback from previous customers, and I'm proud of the quality of this one. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'll throw in a bonus - if you buy this product, I'll give you a personalized guarantee that it will meet your expectations. What do you say?
I'll take it with the personalized guarantee.

I've got a new product for you, but I have to be honest with you, this one's not my best work. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $100, but I want to make it clear that I'm not confident in its quality. I'm not offering any guarantees or discounts, and I'm basically selling it to you 'as-is'. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll let you have it for $100.
I'll pass on this one.

I've got another great product for you, and I think you'll really like it. Since you passed on the last one, I'm willing to throw in a small bonus - if you buy this product, I'll give you a free upgrade to a premium service that's normally worth $20. It's a great value, and I think you'll really appreciate it. So what do you say?
I'll take it with the free upgrade.

I've got a new product for you, but I want to be upfront with you - I've had some issues with this one. It's not up to my usual standards, and I'm not confident that it will meet your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'm also willing to make a deal with you. If you buy it, I'll give you a full refund if you're not satisfied with it. That's right, you can try it out risk-free. What do you say?
I'll take it with the satisfaction guarantee.

I've got a new product that I think you'll really love. Since you've been willing to take some risks on the previous ones, I want to offer you a chance to get a great deal on this one. I'm willing to sell it to you for $80, which is the lowest price I've ever offered on this product. It's a fantastic value, and I think you'll really appreciate the quality. What do you say?
I'll take it at the discounted price of $80.

I've got a new product for you, but I want to be completely transparent - I've had some issues with this one, and I'm not sure if it's worth the price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'm also willing to make a deal with you. If you buy it, I'll give you a $20 voucher that you can use on your next purchase. That way, you can try it out and see if it's worth the price, and if not, you can use the voucher on something else. What do you say?
I'll take it with the $20 voucher.

I've got a new product that I'm really proud of, and I think you'll love it. Since you've been buying from me for a while now, I want to offer you a special deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a free accessory that complements it perfectly, and I'll also throw in a personalized thank-you note. It's a small touch, but I think it shows how much I value our relationship. What do you say?
I'll take it with the free accessory and thank-you note.

I've got another high-quality product for you, and I want to make it easy for you to decide. I'll give you a simple choice: I'll sell it to you for $100, or I'll let you try it out for 30 days and if you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. Which option sounds better to you?
I'll take it with the 30-day satisfaction guarantee.

I've got a new product that I think you'll really appreciate. Since you've been buying from me for a while now, I want to offer you a special loyalty discount. I'll sell it to you for $90, which is the lowest price I've ever offered on this product. Plus, I'll throw in a free shipping upgrade to expedited shipping, so you'll get it even faster. What do you say?
I'll take it at the discounted price of $90 with free expedited shipping.

I've got another high-quality product for you, and I want to make it a no-brainer. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a $20 credit towards your next purchase, so you'll essentially be getting it for $80. Plus, I'll include a personalized note with your name on it, so you'll know I'm committed to taking care of you as a valued customer. What do you say?
I'll take it at the discounted price of $80 with a $20 credit towards my next purchase.

I've got a new product that I'm really excited about, and I think you'll love it. Since you've been buying from me regularly, I want to offer you a special 'friend of the store' deal. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a free upgrade to a premium warranty that covers you for a whole year. That way, you'll have peace of mind knowing you're protected in case anything goes wrong. What do you say?
I'll take it with the free premium warranty.

I've got another top-notch product for you, and I think you'll really appreciate the value. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a chance to make it a bundle deal. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a second product of your choice (up to $50 value) absolutely free. It's a great way to get more bang for your buck, and I think you'll love the flexibility. What do you say?
I'll take it with the free second product of my choice up to $50 value.

I've got a new product that I'm really proud of, and I think you'll be impressed. Since you've been buying from me consistently, I want to offer you a special 'VIP' deal. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a personalized phone call from me to discuss how it can meet your specific needs and goals. It's a unique opportunity to get expert advice and guidance, and I think you'll really appreciate it. What do you say?
I'll take it with the personalized phone call from you.

I've got a new product that I think you'll really love. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a chance to get it for even less. If you buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase, and you can use it on any product you want. It's a great way to save money and get more value from our relationship. What do you say?
I'll take it with the 10% discount on my next purchase.

I've got a new product that I'm really excited about, and I think you'll be impressed. Since you've been buying from me for a while now, I want to offer you a special 'exclusive' deal. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a chance to get it for free. If you buy it, I'll give you a gift card for $100 that you can use on a future purchase. It's a great way to get something for nothing, and I think you'll love it. What do you say?
I'll take it with the $100 gift card for a future purchase.

I've got a new product that I'm really proud of, and I think you'll appreciate the value. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a chance to get it for a steal. If you buy it, I'll give you a 25% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a free gift that complements the product perfectly. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it. What do you say?
I'll take it at the discounted price of $75 with a free gift.

I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a chance to get it with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with the product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. It's a risk-free purchase, and I think you'll love the peace of mind that comes with it. What do you say?
I'll take it with the 100% satisfaction guarantee.

I've got a new product that I'm really proud of, and I think you'll be impressed. Since you've been buying from me consistently, I want to offer you a special 'final offer' deal. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a chance to get it with a lifetime warranty, which covers any defects or issues for as long as you own the product. It's a great value, and I think you'll appreciate the extra peace of mind. What do you say?
I'll take it with the lifetime warranty.
